name: Socially Smitten
description:
Socially Smitten is a team of social media experts who have successfully launched social campaigns, driven consumers towards online brands, and increased engagement by connecting companies with their customers. Our focus is on following the ever-changing Social Media trends, algorithms, and other specifics to create the best content for our clients. 
You’ve already got a great business. Let our team help it grow with effective digital and social media marketing.
